ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c), "M2"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "M2")), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M1"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M3"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M3+"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M3++"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M5"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M6"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M7"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M4"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M4-") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid next stage from M2. Allowed: M1, M3, M3+, M3++, M5, M6, M7, M4, M4-.
